ComicInfo.Title: The Legend of the Crying Woman - La Llorona; That Family Thing; She Sleeps With Anybody But Me; Heroin
ComicInfo.Summary:
Adaptation of the Mexican folk tale.
Story of gay lovers where romantic text doesn't really match the Buck Rogers-style swashbuckling science fiction action.
Luba's family vacations at a nude resort in this flashback story taking place before Maria's death. The family thing, i.e. the family good luck charm they brought with them is missing after Mitch the attendant leaves their room. Maria and Fritz later accuse him of taking it, but he denies. Later on they receive it in the mail after Mitch wins the lottery.
The unnamed superhero pictured in this issue's cover flies a child around the world multiple times as a birthday present. A wordless tale.
A wordless sequence featuring a Bob Hope look-a-like standing up and crouching down.
